Stage II Prostate Cancer
		                    Standard treatment of stage II prostate cancer may include the following:         -  Watchful waiting.    -  Active surveillance. If the cancer begins to grow, hormone therapy may be given.    -  Radical prostatectomy, usually with pelvic lymphadenectomy.
